description: Exp 0 learnability tasks at 3 complexity levels

tasks.instruction: Agent A asks Agent B for the status of a web server.
Agent B tells Agent A that the server is healthy with 99.7% uptime.
A service agent reports a 404 not-found error to the caller agent.
A CI agent requests a builder agent to build a specific repo branch and commit.
A supplier proposes selling 10000 widgets at $2.50 each. The buyer counters with $2.20, citing market average of $2.15.
A planner distributes a data processing task across 3 workers, splitting range 0-3000 into three equal segments.
An orchestrator instructs a pipeline to fetch a URL, parse it as JSON, then store the result in a database. Include message ID and protocol version.

A monitor publishes a severity-2 incident alert about payments service with latency > 2s. Include priority level 4, the causal chain (high latency caused by database connection pool exhaustion caused by traffic spike), and a resolution recommendation.

Write a 3-message conversation: (1) Agent A queries Agent B for diagnostics, (2) Agent B replies with bottleneck info and connection stats, (3) Agent A requests scaling. All messages must have IDs, protocol version, timestamps, and reply-to links.
